name: Wasps!
description: Wasps is a battle arena which puts you in the backyard of your house to fend off all the nasty wasps attacking you and your neighborhood, built for the HTC Vive and room scale VR. Get your lawn mower, chainsaw and the axe and tear them in pieces!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX-8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i7-4xxx or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or higher
